entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
